name: Bigcoin
short_description: Bigcoin is a decentralized ethereum based token which is used for bidding at auction sales and shopping.
description: Bigcoin is a decentralized Ethereum based token which is used for bidding at auction sales and shopping. Bigcoin offers you a structure that allows you to create your own e-commerce space. Bigcoin provides a competitive swap environment to unlock the potential of open finance.
